alert.note: Alert for Rock; Walworth (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 11:18PM CDT until August 11 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN WALWORTH AND SOUTHEASTERN ROCK COUNTIES... At 1118 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Beloit, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Janesville, Beloit, Delavan, Clinton, Darien, Tiffany, Allens Grove, Foxhollow, Avalon, Shopiere, and Emerald Grove. People attending Farmers Market in Beloit should seek safe shelter immediately! HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
